content:
```text
EXISTING STRUCTURES
###Copper plate mine at position(x=-21.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-21.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
-  Burner inserter at position(x=-18.5, y=-48.5) that puts ore into furnace
-  Burner inserter at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5) that extracts from furnace
-  Burner inserter at position(x=-17.5, y=-46.5)

ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using extracting but being too far
 -  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing
### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the path between the entities is valid and can be normalized
### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure you are close enough to the target position to place the entity. The maximum placement distance is 10.
### Errors when crafting items
- Ensure that you have unlocked the recipe for the item you are trying to craft by researching the necessary technology.
### Errors when setting research
- Ensure that you have researched all prerequisite technologies before attempting to research a new technology.
### Errors when getting entities
- Ensure that the entity exists at the specified position before attempting to get it.
### Transport belt blocked
- Clear the transport belt at the drop position of the mining drill to allow it to continue mining.

NAMESPACE
```
